nl.inl.blacklab.analysis

Class BLDutchTokenFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.util.AttributeSource
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
        • org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
          • nl.inl.blacklab.analysis.BLDutchTokenFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class BLDutchTokenFilter
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
    The token filter to accompany BLDutchTokenizer. Will get rid of some unwanted tokens or characters in tokens: * tokens containing no letters are eliminated (e.g. "-") * periods, parens and brackets are removed (e.g. "a.u.b." -> "aub", "bel(len)" -> "bellen") * apostrophes at the beginning or end of a token are removed (e.g. multiple words in single quotes)
